thought: The error indicates that trigger_0 requires an input_data parameter, even if None is passed. I need to fix the call to trigger_0 in mainWorkflow by passing None explicitly. Also, action_1's params are empty, so I need to implement the Slack action parameters properly to send the message to the 'weathers' channel with the formatted text.
plan: Fix trigger_0 call in mainWorkflow by passing None as input_data
Implement action_1 params to send message to Slack channel 'weathers' with messageType 'text' and use expression to get text from input_data
Test the workflow end-to-end to ensure weather is fetched and message sent to Slack
criticism: The previous mainWorkflow call to trigger_0 missed input_data argument, causing TypeError. Also, Slack action params were missing, so no message was sent.
